title: New March update: When you tab over to the left under topics, I can't sign in with my account now
content:
New March update: When you tab over to the left under topics, It shows me not signed in even when Im signed in via other apps and the settings tab. When I click "Turn on" topics it brings up the login screen, I proceed with my login information and it just says "This account already exists on your device."
Any ideas on how to sign in now?
